# Draft:Software Mind

Software Mind is a software development and IT consulting firm based in Kraków, Poland. The company was established in 1999 and works on software engineering, cloud, data, and artificial-intelligence projects.
History
The company was founded in 1999 by Grzegorz Młynarczyk and Konrad Siatka under the name WebSoft, later adopting the name Software Mind.
In 2014, it merged with Wind Mobile; the combined business operated under the name Ailleron, which is listed on the Warsaw Stock Exchange.
In 2020, the private-equity firm Enterprise Investors bought a 50.2 percent share in Software Mind; Ailleron kept the remaining 49.8 percent.
Reports in 2025 indicated that both owners were considering selling their stakes.
From 2021 to 2024 Software Mind expanded through a series of acquisitions, including ValueLogic, Code Factory, VirtualMind, Chmurowisko, Prosoft LLC / number8 and Core3.
Software Mind provides services including generative AI, AI & ML consulting, cloud engineering, data engineering, digital transformation, custom software development, embedded software, UX/UI design, DevOps consulting, software auditing, security governance, and software outsourcing.
Software Mind has been covered by business and trade media including Bankier.pl, CRN Polska, Puls Biznesu, Forbes Poland, Telecom Review Europe, and Telecom Reseller for its acquisitions and expansion.
Awards and recognition
* Amplitiv, a Software Mind product, was recognized as a *Champion of Roaming* by Kaleido Intelligence (2023).
* Forbes Diamonds 2023 — featured in Diamenty Forbesa 2023: Małopolskie as a fast-growing company.
* *ROCCO Group* — Amplitiv was recognized as a *Challenger* in the Steering of Roaming Market Impact Report 2023.
* Gazele Biznesu 2024 — listed as one of Poland’s most dynamic companies.
* PTI Award for Innovativeness in IT.
* Ventura Awards recognition — the company announced the distinction on its LinkedIn page.
* ISO 9001 and ISO 27001 certifications.
* Employer Branding and Wellbeing Awards — recognized as *Poland’s Best Employer Brand on LinkedIn* and for The Best of Wellbeing at Work 2025 by the Wellbeing Institute.
